column2: "Now remember, you're looking for a Fordoran, not a Nordiran. It's the male of the species, so its horns are far more impressive."
"<%me>, you'll be sure to accept my request, right? You're the most trustworthy ARKS in the world."
"I know I've asked you for one thing after another, but you don't mind, do you?"
"I hear Fordoran horns are quite rare, so I'll try to give you a bigger reward than normal."
"Okay then, I can't wait to see what you bring back!"
